attributes.action: Cease the crocodile roll manoeuvre in Rugby Union sports.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that a higher voice will help make notice to the sports world of the care that it's fans have for the safety and honesty, not just for the players, but Rugby itself; awareness makes a fine game of spirit and accuracy; to evolve a more conscience degree of respect for perfection in sports.
attributes.background: I hate to see the risk of Rugby players having their legs (and perhaps their careers) broken when another player uses their full force of turning on a single limb. This is an unnecessary risk that shouldn't jeopardize a player's body by childish acts of recklessness. This change will show care.
